mapper.select: select po.*, pm.user_id as member_user_id from pmd_order po left join pmd_member pm on po.record_id = pm.id where po.type=1 and (po.user_id=#{userId} or pm.user_id=#{userId} or exists(select 1 from pmd_order_item poi, pmd_member pm where poi.sn=po.sn and poi.record_id=pm.id and pm.user_id=#{userId})) order by po.create_time desc

select count(po.sn) from pmd_order po left join pmd_member pm on po.record_id = pm.id where po.type=1 and (po.user_id=#{userId} or pm.user_id=#{userId} or exists(select 1 from pmd_order_item poi, pmd_member pm where poi.sn=po.sn and poi.record_id=pm.id and pm.user_id=#{userId}))

select pmpv.*
order by pmpv.member_id asc

select pmpv.*
order by pmpv.member_id asc

select *, (real_pay-online_real_pay) as cash_real_pay , (real_delay_pay-online_real_delay_pay) as cash_real_delay_pay from ( select -- 已报送分党委数 count(*) as has_report_count from pmd_party where month_id=#{monthId} and has_report=1 )r, ( select -- 党员总数 count(pm.user_id) as member_count, -- 本月应交党费数 sum(pm.due_pay) as due_pay, -- 本月按时缴费党员数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=1 && pm.is_delay=0, 1, 0)) as finish_member_count, -- 本月线上缴纳党费党员数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=1 && pm.is_delay=0 && pm.is_online_pay, 1, 0)) as online_finish_member_count, -- 本月实缴党费数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=1 && pm.is_delay=0, pm.real_pay, 0)) as real_pay, -- 本月线上缴费数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=1 && pm.is_delay=0 && pm.is_online_pay, pm.real_pay, 0)) as online_real_pay, -- 本月延迟缴费数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=0 && pm.is_delay=1, pm.due_pay, 0)) as delay_pay, -- 本月延迟缴费党员数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=0 && pm.is_delay=1, 1, 0)) as delay_member_count from pmd_member pm left join pmd_party pp on pp.month_id=#{monthId} and pm.party_id=pp.party_id where pm.month_id=#{monthId} and pp.has_report=1 )a, ( select -- 补缴往月党费党员数 count(distinct pmpv.user_id) as real_delay_member_count, -- 实补缴往月党费数 sum(pmpv.real_pay) as real_delay_pay, -- 线上补缴往月党费数 sum(if(pmpv.has_pay=1 && pmpv.is_delay=1 && pmpv.is_online_pay, pmpv.real_pay, 0)) as online_real_delay_pay from pmd_member_pay_view pmpv left join pmd_party pp on pp.month_id=#{monthId} and pmpv.charge_party_id=pp.party_id where pmpv.pay_month_id=#{monthId} and pmpv.month_id < #{monthId} and pp.has_report=1 )b

select *, (real_pay-online_real_pay) as cash_real_pay , (real_delay_pay-online_real_delay_pay) as cash_real_delay_pay from ( select -- 支部总数 count(*) as branch_count, -- 已报送党支部数 sum(if(has_report=1,1,0)) as has_report_count from pmd_branch where month_id=#{monthId} and party_id=#{partyId} )r, ( select -- 党员总数 count(pm.user_id) as member_count, -- 本月应交党费数 sum(pm.due_pay) as due_pay, -- 本月按时缴费党员数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=1 && pm.is_delay=0, 1, 0)) as finish_member_count, -- 本月线上缴纳党费党员数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=1 && pm.is_delay=0 && pm.is_online_pay, 1, 0)) as online_finish_member_count, -- 本月实缴党费数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=1 && pm.is_delay=0, pm.real_pay, 0)) as real_pay, -- 本月线上缴费数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=1 && pm.is_delay=0 && pm.is_online_pay, pm.real_pay, 0)) as online_real_pay, -- 本月延迟缴费数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=0 && pm.is_delay=1, pm.due_pay, 0)) as delay_pay, -- 本月延迟缴费党员数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=0 && pm.is_delay=1, 1, 0)) as delay_member_count from pmd_member pm left join pmd_branch pb on pb.month_id=#{monthId} and pm.party_id=pb.party_id and pm.branch_id=pb.branch_id where pm.month_id=#{monthId} and pm.party_id=#{partyId} and pb.has_report=1 )a, ( select -- 补缴往月党费党员数 count(distinct pmpv.user_id) as real_delay_member_count, -- 实补缴往月党费数 sum(pmpv.real_pay) as real_delay_pay, -- 线上补缴往月党费数 sum(if(pmpv.has_pay=1 && pmpv.is_delay=1 && pmpv.is_online_pay, pmpv.real_pay, 0)) as online_real_delay_pay from pmd_member_pay_view pmpv left join pmd_branch pb on pb.month_id=#{monthId} and pmpv.charge_party_id=pb.party_id and pmpv.charge_branch_id=pb.branch_id where pmpv.pay_month_id=#{monthId} and pmpv.charge_party_id=#{partyId} and pmpv.month_id < #{monthId} and pb.has_report=1 )b

select *, -- 本月现金缴纳党费数 (real_pay-online_real_pay) as cash_real_pay, -- 往月现金缴纳党费数 (real_delay_pay-online_real_delay_pay) as cash_real_delay_pay from ( select -- 党员总数 count(pm.user_id) as member_count, -- 本月应交党费数 sum(pm.due_pay) as due_pay,
-- 本月按时缴费党员数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=1 && pm.is_delay=0, 1, 0)) as finish_member_count, -- 本月线上缴纳党费党员数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=1 && pm.is_delay=0 && pm.is_online_pay, 1, 0)) as online_finish_member_count, -- 本月实缴党费数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=1 && pm.is_delay=0, pm.real_pay, 0)) as real_pay, -- 本月线上缴纳党费数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=1 && pm.is_delay=0 && pm.is_online_pay, pm.real_pay, 0)) as online_real_pay, -- 本月延迟缴纳党费数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=0 && pm.is_delay=1, pm.due_pay, 0)) as delay_pay, -- 本月延迟缴纳党费党员数 sum(if(pm.has_pay=0 && pm.is_delay=1, 1, 0)) as delay_member_count
from pmd_member pm where pm.month_id=#{monthId} and pm.party_id=#{partyId} -- branchId=null时统计直属党支部
and pm.branch_id=#{branchId}
and pm.branch_id is null
)a, ( select
-- 补缴往月党费党员数 count(distinct pmpv.user_id) as real_delay_member_count, -- 实补缴往月党费数 sum(pmpv.real_pay) as real_delay_pay, -- 往月线上补缴党费数 sum(if(pmpv.has_pay=1 && pmpv.is_delay=1 && pmpv.is_online_pay, pmpv.real_pay, 0)) as online_real_delay_pay
from pmd_member_pay_view pmpv where pmpv.pay_month_id=#{monthId} and pmpv.charge_party_id=#{partyId} -- branchId=null时统计直属党支部
and pmpv.charge_branch_id=#{branchId}
and pmpv.charge_branch_id is null
and pmpv.month_id < #{monthId})b
